comment: "I was paid extra for photos that they didn't end up using (so more than the amount listed) but I was taxed 30% of total, which I found to be unusual."
"I've worked with them before, but this is their standard rate. They add another $100 for pictures (which I had, and they wanted), so the rate is $350 without them. "
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication
